extension.summary: A modern Web UI for your XBMC
extension.description: This version had been replaced by Chorus2 which is now the default Kodi web interface. See github.com/xbmc/chorus2 for more info and the latest updates. Chorus1 is a modern Web UI for your XBMC. Browse your Music, Movies or TV Shows from the comfort of your own web browser. You can play media via XBMC or stream it in your browser. Works best with Chrome but plays well with most modern browsers.
